game.name: Bouncy Brain
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A chill-interactive physics game where you drop a bouncing brain through chaotic undead playfields, gather ingredients, trigger light interactions, and cook bizarre soups in a relaxing, low-pressure gaming experience.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A chill-interactive physics game where you drop a bouncing brain through chaotic undead playfields, gather ingredients, trigger light interactions, and cook bizarre soups in a relaxing, low-pressure gaming experience.
